The Negros Island Region (NIR) was abolished through Executive Order No. 38
Revoking Executive Order No. 183 (s. 2015) which Created a Negros Island Region and for Other Purposes,
signed by President Rodrigo Roa Duterte on 07 August 2017. The abolition of NIR reverted the provinces, cities, municipalities, and barangays
of Negros Occidental and City of Bacolod to Region VI (Western Visayas) and Negros Oriental to Region VII (Central Visayas).
Renamed province from Compostela Valley under Republic Act No. 11297, dated April 17, 2019; ratified on December 7, 2019
Renamed region from ARMM under Republic Act No.11054, dated July 27, 2018; ratified on January 25, 2019.
